value.text: Version 5.4 Event - Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival

customize.name: Festival Stamp
customize.desc: A stamp gained from playing games at the Mikawa Flower Festival. It represents both the festival-goer's appreciation and the creator's passion...

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Tamayuratei no Ohanashi
customize.desc: Once upon a time, there was a youkai that roamed Inazuma in the form of a lantern's flame. This must once have been one of its vessels.

customize.name: Philosophies of Transience
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Transience is the dream of the nation of thunder.
The fleeting nature of this mortal world is the essence of beauty, for are our lives in this world not akin to the levin flash? Yet the might of the divine comes suddenly, and before the roar of eternity, who can stand?

customize.name: Festival Stamp
customize.desc: A stamp gained from playing games at the Mikawa Flower Festival. It represents both the festival-goer's appreciation and the creator's passion...

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Smoldering Phosphorescent Flame
customize.desc:
Specialized refinement material for "Tamayuratei no Ohanashi."
Embers of phosphorescent fire scattered by a youkai who once donned the form of flame, traveling the length and breadth of Inazuma. Just as each and every oil lamp remembers the words of those who once gathered beneath its glow, there may well be memories retained within these dispersed embers that are of great import to some.

customize.name: Philosophies of Elegance
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Elegance is the form of the nation of thunder.
Elegance abhors vulgarity, and the elegant ever walk alone. Resisting base evils, unmoved by base loves, never taking refuge in base ignorance â€” that is how one perceives the chasm between the elegant and the contemptuous.

customize.name: Philosophies of Light
customize.desc:
Talent Level-Up material.
Light is the yearning of the land of thunder.
Though they must live forever on the earth, humanity will always reach for the light. Mortals will pursue and surpass, and they will never stop. A sealed eternity may, perhaps, look magnificent, but its essence is death.

customize.name: Mysterious Gift
customize.desc: A gift gained from playing games at the Mikawa Flower Festival. It appears to be an exquisitely-made furnishing...

customize.text: Festive Backdrop: Sweet as Dreams Should Be

customize.name: Crown of Insight
customize.desc:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech. Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.
